feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
